statements: DELETE FROM Components WHERE name = 'LED Bulb';
DELETE FROM LightBulbs WHERE brand = 'Philips' AND wattage > 60;
DELETE FROM MaintenanceRecords WHERE maintenance_date < '2022-01-01' AND notes LIKE '%replacement%';
DELETE FROM components WHERE component_name = 'LED Bulb';
DELETE FROM light_bulbs WHERE wattage > 60 AND price < 20.00;
DELETE FROM components WHERE quantity = 0 OR price > 100.00;
DELETE FROM Components WHERE stock_quantity < 10 AND unit_price > 50.00;
